prompt: Write a short story about a lonely robot discovering friendship in a post-apocalyptic world.
Write a haiku about autumn leaves falling in a quiet forest.
Describe a sunrise on Mars as vividly as possible.
Write a conversation between a pirate captain and their parrot about a lost treasure.
Write a dramatic scene where a magician loses their powers during a duel.
Write a futuristic news article announcing the first human colony on Europa.
Write a comedic monologue about someone getting stuck in a smart fridge.
Write a love letter from an astronaut to Earth.
Write a fantasy prophecy in poetic form.
Describe a bustling alien marketplace using all five senses.
Write the internal thoughts of a sentient book who wants to be read.
Create a bedtime story for a dragon child.
Write an email complaint to a wizard school about misdelivered spellbooks.
Write a poem about a forgotten memory coming back to life.
Describe the sound of silence in a city that never sleeps.
